Projects Papers About

12-DOF Quadrupedal Robot: Inverse Kinematics

I wrote this paper to formally document all of the math that went into solving a full Inverse Kinematics model for a 12 degree of freedom quadrupedal robot with multiple joint offsets. Written for my OpenQuadruped project.
